casebody.data:
MURRAY
v.
UNIVERSITY OF NC AT CHAPEL HILL 124A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Laura H. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, for University of North Carolina At Chapel Hill. Henry Clay Turner, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Murray, Jillian.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of August 2016 by Defendant for Judicial Notice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
